recipes.label: A Bright Idea is Needed
recipes.startdescription: For what I face now, no solution is apparent. However, I could create one. I can approach this challenge with either the brilliance of Lantern or the ingeniuity of Forge.
recipes.description: For what I face now, no solution is apparent. However, I could create one. I can approach this challenge with either the brilliance of Lantern or the ingeniuity of Forge.

recipes.label: A Flare of Brilliance
recipes.startdescription: One can find the true solution to any problem. Like the Watchman, I will navigate towards that Truth. We will probably succeed.

recipes.label: A Glimmmer of Brilliance
recipes.startdescription: One can find the proper solution to any problem. If I think without mercy and without mistakes, I will find that solution. We will likely succeed.

recipes.label: A Flicker of Brilliance
recipes.startdescription: One can find the right solution to any problem. If I cast out the doubtful shadows from my thoughts, I will find that solution. We may yet succed.

recipes.label: A Blaze of Inspiration
recipes.startdescription: My mind is like a smelter. I blaze like the Malleary, and if I speak I might spit flame. We will probably succeed.

recipes.label: A Flash of Inspiration
recipes.startdescription: My mind is like a smelter- no concept that enters it remains unchanged. We will likely succeed.

recipes.label: A Spark of Inspiration
recipes.startdescription: My mind is like a smelter, which inputs sensations and outputs ideas. We may yet succeed.
